Sources.Title: Bezeq Chief Resigns as Netanyahu-Linked Corruption Probe ...
Sources.Snippet: Stella Handler, the head of Bezeq Israeli Telecommunication Corp., will step down on July 1, the latest top executive to depart Israel’s largest telecommunications firm amid a widening corruption probe linked to Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

Sources.Title: Israeli Court Extends Custody of Telecom Giant CEO in ...
Sources.Snippet: An Israeli court issued an order to extend the detention of Stella Handler, the CEO of the telecom giant Bezeq, by another six days on Wednesday as part of the widening investigation of corruption and improper government influence at the company.
